title: Brad and Andrew Make 3 Tall Boy Beer Cocktails | From the Test Kitchen | Bon Appétit
description:
Tall boy Andrew Knowlton teaches tall boy Brad Leone how to turn tall boy beers into cocktails. Watch as Andrew shows Brad how to make a canned Michelada, a Beerita and an Amaro Spike.

Check out the recipes here: https://www.bonappetit.com/story/beer-can-cocktails
